item.title: Useful Docker Shortcut Commands
item.description: Docker Shell Command “Shortcuts” I’ve been working with Docker a lot lately and have found it useful to note down a few “shortcut” commands to maintain my local images and containers, until I have them memorized. Here they are. Start/Stop All Docker Containers This example starts then stops all containers: $ docker start $(docker ps -aq) a12b34c5d678 b23c46d6e789 c34d57e7f790 $ docker stop $(docker ps -q) a12b34c5d678 b23c46d6e789 c34d57e7f790 Remove All Docker Images This example removes all Docker images:
